name: @a11ygato/platform
description: a11ygato suite of tools to analyze and monitor accessibility results

scripts.postinstall: cd modules/audit-engine && npm i && cd ../cli && npm i && cd ../webservice && npm i && cd ../dashboard && npm i
scripts.start: npm run start:ws && npm run start:db
scripts.restart: npm run delete && npm run start
scripts.lint: cd modules/audit-engine && npm run lint && cd ../cli && npm run lint && cd ../webservice && npm run lint && cd ../dashboard && npm run lint
scripts.pull: git pull && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build: cd modules/dashboard && npm run build --script-shell bash
scripts.clean: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf modules/*/node_modules && rm -f modules/*/package-lock.json

author: Orange
